_instructions.purpose: Services page template showcasing comprehensive service offerings
_instructions.usage: Generate detailed services page highlighting capabilities, processes, and expertise
_instructions.scalability: Services can be expanded from 3-12 items based on company offerings

meta.title: [PROMPT] Generate SEO title: '{Industry} Services - {Company} | {Key Service Categories}' (max 60 chars)
meta.description: [PROMPT] Write meta description covering main services, capabilities, and unique value propositions (max 160 chars)

hero.type: [PROMPT] Choose 'video' for manufacturing/industrial services, 'image' for consulting/design services
hero.title: [PROMPT] Generate services hero title ('Our Services', 'Service Excellence', 'Comprehensive Solutions')
hero.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle describing service range and quality commitment
hero.backgroundVideo: [PROMPT] For video: Manufacturing/service process video URL
hero.backgroundImage: [PROMPT] For image: Professional services image from Unsplash (search: {industry}, services, professional, manufacturing)

services.title: [PROMPT] Generate main services title ('Our Services', 'Service Offerings', 'What We Provide')
services.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about comprehensive solutions and expertise

items.title: [PROMPT] Primary service title
items.description: [PROMPT] Write compelling service description highlighting value and benefits (2-3 sentences)
capabilities: [PROMPT] Generate 4-8 specific capabilities/features for this service

items: [PROMPT] Add 4-8 more services based on company offerings. Common services: design/engineering, manufacturing, quality assurance, consulting, maintenance, installation, training, etc.

capabilities.title: [PROMPT] Generate capabilities title ('Our Capabilities', 'Technical Expertise', 'What Sets Us Apart')
capabilities.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about advanced technology and expertise

items.title: [PROMPT] Quality/precision title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe quality standards and precision capabilities

manufacturing-process.title: [PROMPT] Generate process title ('Our Process', 'Service Methodology', 'How We Deliver')
manufacturing-process.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about systematic approach and excellence

steps.title: [PROMPT] Initial phase title (Consultation, Requirements, Planning)
steps.description: [PROMPT] Describe first step in service delivery process

steps.title: [PROMPT] Quality/testing phase title
steps.description: [PROMPT] Describe quality assurance and testing procedures

steps.title: [PROMPT] Completion/finishing phase title
steps.description: [PROMPT] Describe final completion and finishing processes

cta.title: [PROMPT] Generate service CTA title ('Ready to Start?', 'Let's Discuss Your Project', 'Get Expert Help')
cta.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create compelling subtitle encouraging consultation/engagement

secondaryCTA.action: [PROMPT] Phone number or additional info destination
